# Tax treatment of insurance agents: general: arrangement of guidance

A comprehensive Statement of Practice (SP4/97) was issued on 27 November 1997. SP4/97 entirely replaces an earlier statement, SP5/95, which should no longer be used or quoted. The statement deals, amongst other things, with the taxation of insurance commissions received by employees and others. The part of the Statement of Practice relating to employeesâ€™ liabilities is reproduced at [EIM64605](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM64605.htm).
